fields.description:
As an account admin I would like to view standard usage reports so that I can more easily determine cloud utilization and manage cost and resources more effectively.

Canned reports available for viewing/filtering may include the following:
- EC2 Instance Usage report

Offer only daily and monthly granularity.

Limit time range to 1 year max prior to current date (via custom range selection).
fields.summary: View standard usage reports (EC2 Instance Usage Report)
Implement server side API for report generation

fields.summary: Implement services to supply monthly report data

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body:
Month selection works and pulls actual data from service (for page and csv). Will work with updated cloud, but fails with current dev cloud due to spacing on column name we depend on. I tested by adding space in name to get around bug.

bq. {{+++ b/eucaconsole/views/reporting.py
bq. @@ -123,7 +123,7 @@ class ReportingAPIView(BaseView):
bq.          if len(data) == 0:
bq.              return dict(result=[])
bq.          grouped = data.groupby(('ProductName', 'UsageType'))
bq. -        totals = grouped['UsageQuantity'].sum()
bq. +        totals = grouped['Usage    Quantity'].sum()
bq.          totals_list = totals.to_frame().to_records().tolist()
bq. }}

NOTE: not easy to see, but that's 4 spaces added.
[~dkavanagh]: PR 2189 merged.  Should I move this ticket to QA, or is there more work to be done?
[~kgill] This story seems like it may be too broad. I'll look over the epic an see if adjusting some story titles is helpful.
Found js and pt files for instance report page, re-linking into reports tab.
Punting back to address PR comments.
This is blocked by sub-tasks that are not complete. I needed to move this issue to close out the sprint.
[~lbiasi] Which sub-tasks block this? All are either closed or resolved.
